description: Cisco Adaptive Security Appliance (ASA) software 7.2 and 8.2 before 8.2(5.58), 8.3 and 8.4 before 8.4(7.29), 8.5 through 8.7 before 8.7(1.17), 9.0 before 9.0(4.37), 9.1 before 9.1(6.4), 9.2 before 9.2(4), 9.3 before 9.3(3.1), and 9.4 before 9.4(1.1) allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (device reload) via a crafted DNS response, aka Bug ID CSCut03495.
